Reviews.Content: nice people lady breakfasts cold especially shower hold outside satisfactory window boarded replaced breakfasts fine location excellent apart forced drive congestion zone hotel outside fantastic car park crawford st ncp ony £16 night

Reviews.Content: try stayed weekend meetings leisure special request getting london 1130 am ready pay extra couple pound freshened 5 hour journey meeting told ready leave bags hallway choice anyway meetings hotel 5pm lift thank goodness wasnt bad double booked lot mold bathroom size wise bad heating water luke warm pleasant coffee sugar popped round corner essentials milk coffee sugar morning shower pretty warmish hot acceptable breakfast bit strange managed table hard boiled eggs hard boiled word continental breakfast eye opener guests breakfast ours told wait outside restaurant happened kicked hotel revamp lot wasted space am star rating emergency maybe crash station benches sorry didnt meet expectations reviews dont look lot nice cared

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT BOOK THIS HOTEL!!!!”

Reviews.Content: suggest book hotel card details automatically charge amount tell cancel free charge 2 days prior arrival date cancel looking bad hotel actually realising ensuite 5 admin charges confirming taking surely theft aware time booking confirmed terms conditions booked bad conversation guy reception proceeded tell wishes discuss hotel special hotel special hand card details awful awful hotel check reviews pay price reasonable hotels league cost sounds ground

Reviews.Title: “Smelly, dirty and run-down~and that's just for starters!”
Reviews.Author: CathyCat_11
Reviews.Content: booked couple nights london sister birthday treat bad start abruptly told move night double ground floor front house reminded squalid student accommodation filthy windows peeling dated decor dirty stained bath offered help bags staff offhand impolite night worse help luggage revolting dirty decor stiflingly hot net curtains black bloodstained bathroom cramped tatty shower cold couldnt wait disgusting experience

Reviews.Title: “Just don't bother”
Reviews.Author: TonyA57
Reviews.Content: entrance hall stinks cigarrettes hotelier declared nonsmoking hotel carpets seen days 20 ago appear onsuite facilities price offer desk angle vertical horizontal looks constructed seven decor carpets missing pieces paint windows doors wardrobe doors fit wedged shut leave hear movement floor below ceiling recipe restfull nights sleep average night ensuite breakfast amounts run hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not worth it at any price, even if it's free!”
Reviews.Author: BostonRolly
Reviews.Content: hotel joke barely running water shower water cold time run 15 minutes hot water cold brochure claims complimentary breakfast managment extra run mildew smell matter hotel run brochure printed 30 ago postive location convenient wonderful restaurants sincerely wouldnt worst enemy stay dump

Reviews.Title: “Actually the worst hotel I've ever stayed in - one phrase - beds that smelt of urine.”
Reviews.Author: LionHeartedGirl
Reviews.Content: mum tickets week nov 2010 combine shopping searched found georgian hotel location 10 minutes walk oxford street shop leisure evening worrying catching trains lugging bags arrived building whereas real selling original features looked run soon walk smell kitchen permeates building owner manager pleasant despite nauseating comments mum sister check speedy pay advance id booked family double single bed twin available basic wasnt werent intending toilet bathroom clean lacked necessities soap carpets grubby stuffy sleep nightmare hotel double glazing street fourth floor kept awake night sounds lanes traffic flying past annoying liveable wasnt appalling beds dirty stained sheets lumpy actually physically lumpy beds unbelievably uncomfortable worst single bed half hour suddenly smell urine obviously family child wet bed foul towels bed wasnt sleeping close mattress short time pyjamas smelt urine sharing mum double uncomfortable minus pee barely slept wink breakfast morning pitiful affair cooked breakfasts fresh fruit yoghurt herbal fruit teas pastries offered tea coffee kinds cereal toast £110 night expect little add fun dining tiny dingy basement tables peeling wallpaper grimy decor worst stay ive thinking makes shudder escape left home didnt spend sunday london cheap hotel £110 expect decent level hygiene facilities hotel london sleep bench vile disgusting totally priced dont stay

Reviews.Title: “makes fawlty towers look like the Hilton”
Reviews.Author: tooter2
Reviews.Content: booked hotel lastminute description online brochures found reception refer earlier incarnation hotel notice aa guide ratings door ten date arrived reception finally found downstairs alternative reception cigarette smoke despite public building smoke permeate 3 floors insisted taking drivers licence worries cant hostel pictures unscrewed walls leaving dirty outlines private bathroom hall hadnt specified booking details laughable price charged £75 single didnt include breakfast id paid lastminute refund thoroughly miserable experience round

Reviews.Title: “A truly awful place that is more like a run down hostel”
Reviews.Author: Gary022
Reviews.Content: booked couple nights stay travel republic photos looked location ideal dated scruffy clean constant noise road impossible sleep guests key fits security £100 night food expensive recommend using georgian hotel disappointed run hostel hotel

Reviews.Title: “RATS”
Reviews.Author: alisonandjoe73
Reviews.Content: walking miles dated overpriced hotel girlfriend didnt worse rat droppings rats bitten utterly disgusting hardest people please clean sheets half decent location hotel offered neither dissappointing

Reviews.Title: “Awful Experience”
Reviews.Author: GlobalBizMgr
Reviews.Content: hotel 11 pm day flight rang bell 20 minutes luckily family woke clerk ownersmanagers proceeded lip woke wasnt charged 5 pounds late arrival beyond appalling treatment ac breakfast lousy ambiance rundown dump advise considering hotel convenient location avoid booking costs stay dump sleazy owners
